sentences.en: Accordingly, the literature in English that has come down to us from this period (1150-1250) is almost exclusively religious or admonitory.
sentences.cn: 因此，从这一时期（1150—1250）流传下来给我们的用英语写的作品几乎单一地是关于宗教或劝告的。

sentences.en: Objective To standardize the warning languages and the patterns in admonitory plates.
sentences.cn: 目的使警示标识牌的图案及警示语句达到规范化.

sentences.en: She shot an admonitory glance at her son.
sentences.cn: 她向儿子投去责备的目光.

sentences.en: This is of an admonitory nature.
